1457470.name: Diamond Sun
1457470.description:
An Evocative Hand-Crafted World

The world of Diamond Sun is brought to life in vivid, moody detail, its caverns alive with bizarre and terrifying creatures, each animatedin a unique 3D style. Every new area you’ll discover is beautifully unique and strange, teeming with new creatures and characters. Take in the sights and uncover new wonders hidden off of the beaten path. If you like classic gameplay, cute but creepy characters, epic adventure and beautiful, gothic worlds, then Diamond Sun awaits!


Brave the Depths of a Forsaken World

Beneath the surface of a flooded planet lies a ruined kingdom shrouded in mystery. Many venture into its depths, chasing after treasure, glory, or long-buried secrets. Diamond Sun is a classically inspired rogue-like adventure set in a sprawling, interconnected world. Traverse winding tunnels, explore lost cities, and navigate perilous landscapes; face off against fearsome foes, encounter eccentric allies, and unravel the enigmatic truths hidden at the heart of this forgotten realm.

Experience Unique and Thrilling Combat

In Diamond Sun, you will experience a unique and dynamic mix of both first-person and third-person combat perspectives, allowing you to seamlessly switch between the two depending on your situation and playstyle. Whether you're engaging in close-quarters battles with precision aim in first-person or unleashing powerful abilities and managing your surroundings in third-person, the game offers a varied and immersive experience.
